title: Microsoft Promises Future Call of Duty Games on PlayStation - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.09.22
description:
Blessing and special guest, Jordan Middler from Video Games Chronicle, talk about Activision-Blizzard games remaining multiplatform, a leaked Assassin's Creed Game, and more.

Follow Jordan: https://twitter.com/JordanMiddler 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:22 - Housekeeping
We’re reacting to that Nintendo Direct later today. It’s gonna be Tim, Greg, Andy, and myself. Make sure to tune in right here on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 2pm pt.
And then also remember: It’s review season. Your next episode of the Kinda Funny Gamescast will be our Horizon Forbidden West review. That’ll be up Monday, Valentine’s day on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:30 - Microsoft Confirms Activision Blizzard Will Release Games on PlayStation 'Beyond Existing Agreements' - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:10:24 - Do you think this hurts, or helps, the chances of GamePass one day winding up on PlayStation? - Best Friends Q:Conor
00:10:40 - Is it a tit for tat regarding Bungie titles? Could it be an attempt to look better for regulators? Is it just them not wanting to limit CoD's potential revenue? - Best Friends Q:Grezick
00:24:32 - Ubisoft is planning a new Assassin’s Creed - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:31:45 - Ad
00:36:40 - We could’ve gotten a Young Sully game! - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:43:36 - Sony Announces Gran Turismo Sophy, a New Artificial Intelligence - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:47:45 - A new PlayStation update is making some changes - Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:51:50 - Looks like more NES/SNES games are finally coming to Switch - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:55:55 - Out today
00:57:23 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim

content:encoded:
Blessing and special guest, Jordan Middler from Video Games Chronicle, talk about Activision-Blizzard games remaining multiplatform, a leaked Assassin's Creed Game, and more.


Follow Jordan: https://twitter.com/JordanMiddler


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:06:22 - Housekeeping

We’re reacting to that Nintendo Direct later today. It’s gonna be Tim, Greg, Andy, and myself. Make sure to tune in right here on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 2pm pt.

And then also remember: It’s review season. Your next episode of the Kinda Funny Gamescast will be our Horizon Forbidden West review. That’ll be up Monday, Valentine’s day on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
